name: Tiles of Life
description:
DESCRIPTIONS:

A puzzle game where you try to replicate the patterns given in each level.

You play by:

  1. Click on one of the colors in the right side of the screen
  2. Click on the grid to fill a tile with color
  3. Simulate and see what happens.
CREDITS: ICONS:

play icon = Play icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

pause icon = Pause icons created by inkubators - Flaticon

stop icon = Back icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

cursor = Cursor icons created by Pixel perfect - Flaticon

home = Home icons created by Freepik - Flaticon
